title: Amy Ran Into Bobby’s Ex-Girlfriend And It Was A Little Awkward + We Draw Picks for Forced Movie Recommendations + Amy Has An Important Halloween PSA
itunes:title: Amy Ran Into Bobby’s Ex-Girlfriend And It Was A Little Awkward + We Draw Picks for Forced Movie Recommendations + Amy Has An Important Halloween PSA
description:
Amy ran into Bobby’s ex-girlfriend, Lindsay Ell at an event last night and she performed a song about Bobby. We draw our movies for the Forced Movie Recommendation game. Plus, Amy has an important PSA about letting Trick-Or-Treaters into your house on Halloween. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
